title: How to "Use all my monitors for the remote session" like mstsc
author: XufeiYang
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
In Win10 mSTSC.exe, there is an option to "use all my monitors for remote session", and in the RDP10 protocol, multi-monitor and multi-resolution scaling can be done.In Win10 systems, you can set different scales for each monitor, and this feature can be passed to the remote session, so that the remote session and the local display look the same.
